knimeNode.name: XLogP
knimeNode.shortDescription: Prediction of logP based on the atom-type method called XLogP.

fullDescription.intro:
Prediction of logP based on the atom-type method called XLogP, for details of the methodology see
Wang, R., Fu, Y., and Lai, L.. A New Atom-Additive Method for Calculating Partition Coefficients, Journal of Chemical Information and Computer Sciences. vol. 37. 1997, pp. 615-621.
fullDescription.option: Select the column containing the molecular structure.

ports.inPort: Table containing molecular structure based on which the logP shall be computed

outPort.name: Input table with appended XLogP column

ports.outPort: As input but with one additional column containing the XLogP value
